title: Pvp.net issues
body: I have never really had this issue until literally this year. So to start off every time i play a match during the banning phase especially on my turn pvp.net decides to disconnect me. i have tried everything. restarting the router, reconnecting and disconnecting, turning off my firewall. None of it will work every time i try to play i only get disconnected on my turn to ban why?

replies.body: An unstable connection could cause you to lose sync in champion select and get left behind.  You've taken some solid steps so far, but I also suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as well to help!  Test it out in a custom game to be sure.  Let me know if the issue persists after.
I wouldnt care about this if riot wasnt giving e leaver busters making friends not want to play with me it really ruins the game.
